title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4064.11 - Contracts of employment to be filed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4064.11 - Contracts of employment to be filed

State Regulations

The terms of all contracts between jockeys and their
employers shall be filed with and approved by the National Steeplechase and

Hunt Association before a license is granted; and such contracts may contain a
provision that in case a jockey's license is revoked or suspended, the salary
of the jockey in the case of a revocation shall cease, and in the case of a
suspension shall cease during the time of such suspension. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4064.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
